projects.shortDesc: The quick brown fox jumped over the lazy moon
projects.iWant: to have an app that transcribes meetings in real time
projects.soThat: I can focus on the tasks and next steps
projects.userStory: As a busy executive, I want to have an app that transcribes meetings in real time so that I can focus on the tasks and next steps.
projects.name: Erlich Bachmann

projects.shortDesc: Peter Piper picked a peck of pickled pepper
projects.iWant: to have a way to get my kids to do chores and win prizes
projects.soThat: I can have a nice glass of wine when I get home at night
projects.userStory: As a single working parent, I want to have a way to get my kids to do chores and win prizes so that I can go have a nice glass of wine when I get home at night.
projects.name: Bridget Jones

completedProjects.shortDesc: App that helps bartenders and patrons to choose the best drink for them!
completedProjects.userStory: As a Bartender, I want to keep my patrons happy so that I don't have to keep remaking drinks.

completedProjects.shortDesc: App that helps Product Managers streamline the build and deploy process!
completedProjects.userStory: As a Product Manager, I want to be able to create User Stories, so that developers can understand the requirements needed for the project.

completedProjects.shortDesc: App that allows new developers or career pivoters to showcase what they learned
completedProjects.userStory: As a student in Software Engineering, I want to have a website that showcases my portfolio and experience so that I can get a job.
